answers.answer: They test your blood sugar levels. It shows how well your pancreas is producing insulin.
When is the glucose test done and is it for every pregnant tomen?

I think they only test you in England if they are concerned. Often due to the weight / size of the pregnant lady or if there is a chance of diabetes during pregnancy. In America it seems like they do it routinely (I'm presuming anyway) X
Yes.when i was on my 20 weeks i already took that glucose test. I was required to do fasting
I'm from Scotland and they only make you test if they are concerned. I have a 2 1/2hour test on Wednesday and that's to see if that's the reason my fluid levels are high
Thanks just I saw therapist talking about drinking something first and I'm inMy fourth and hadn't heard about it good luck princess hope all's well Xxx

You drink this gross liquid and then wait a specific amount of time and then they take your blood to test for gestational diabetes.I think I did it with my son at 24weeks
